natural_language_question: Connect patents cited in UniProtKB with those in the patent database at EPO via publication number, whose grant date is more than twenty years in the past.
predicted_query:
# https://sparql.uniprot.org/sparql
PREFIX up: <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?protein ?citedPatent
WHERE {
  # Retrieve proteins from UniProtKB
  SERVICE <https://sparql.uniprot.org/sparql> {
    ?protein rdf:type up:Protein .
    ?protein rdfs:seeAlso ?patent .
    ?patent rdf:type up:PatentCitation .
    BIND (?patent AS ?citedPatent)
  }
}
LIMIT 100
